nodes.text: Coruscant Space Traffic Coordination was the government office under the Galactic Empire that was charged with monitoring and clearing all spacecraft entering or leaving the planet Coruscant.

According to Mirax Terrik, certain members of the office had been paid to allow a clear entry for slave runners heading to certain brothels at the edge of the Invisible Sector. The Rebel Alliance used this loophole to enter Coruscant, eventually seizing the planet from the Empire.
